Title: Directs the department of public service to study and report on the current status of cable television systems providing services over fiberoptic cables
Summary: Authorizes and directs the department of public service to study and report on the current status of cable television systems operating and providing services to the customer premises over fiberoptic cables.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize and direct the department of public service to study and report on the current status of cable television systems operating and providing services to the customer premises over fiberoptic cables
